Note: Over 1500 paying students since the course was published - and already over 30 x 5 Star Reviews. See below.

Course fully updated 15th May 2016

If you know your subject, teaching a course on Udemy is simple - and profitable!

However, there’s a problem!

A big problem!

Actually CREATING a course is REALLY HARD to do!

(Well, it was before now!)

You needed lots of programs, perhaps including Camtasia, Powerpoint, and many others.

And then - agony of agonies - you had to get everything together.

  • Combine voice and pictures with slides / PowerPoint
  • Add any video or screen grabs
  • Make changes
  • Get everything to line up

Nightmare!

However, in this course, Udemy instructor Chris Towland shows you a really simple way to create the most beautiful appealing courses, using just one wonderful piece of software, Easy VSL!

There’s no need for anything else, as this easy to use program does EVERYTHING to make your Udemy course complete.

And it’s not only easy - it looks terrific too … and how a course looks is just as important as the content, if you want to get large numbers of sales.

He’s fully personalised the lessons to show you how to create the perfect Udemy course - using tips and techniques that are crucial to the success of your course sales.
title: UDEMY - Create Udemy Courses Easier With EasyVSL -Unofficial
